elements.innerHtml:
HI, I'm HYUKJU-KWON

I majored in architecture from the age of 17, gained experience in practical work in the middle of the year when I turned 19, and a year later, I entered the indoor architecture department of Inha Technical University to upgrade my skills. Now I'm fluent in both practice and theory.

DESIGN PROCESS

A DESIGN THAT CAPTURES THE YEARS

Using baedari neglected idle site, the complex cultural center was designed to remember the pain of the long-term development and disconnected pear bridge, revitalize the forgotten history and used bookstore streets, and provide local residents and visitors with various things to see and enjoy.
~ Preview ~

THE POWER TO MAKE THE WORLD ROLL

02.

THE POWER TO MAKE THE WORLD ROLL

view details

DESIGN PROCESS

A DESIGN THAT FITS THE CITY'S AESTHETIC

The aging bicycle storage has been left unattended for years or months, so it can no longer be used for original storage purposes. Accordingly, the government has invested a lot of budget to carry out reorganization projects, but over time, it has no choice but to return to a neglected state.
Therefore, the bicycle battery relay station was created by combining energy recycling with a shared mobility business that everyone can own, not individual ownership.
~ Preview ~
THE POWER TO MAKE THE WORLD ROLL
